questions.question: What are you looking for?
questions.description: Get started by letting us know a little bit about what you need

questions.question: Select the form in which you want to avail this unsecured loan.
questions.description: This helps us identify the most suitable loan structure for you. For details, check our Drop-line Overdraft (DOD) Page.

questions.question: Do you have any existing obligations?
questions.description: This includes all types of loans and credit limits you may have, such as personal loans, home loans, car loans, credit card loans (excluding monthly dues), gold loans, consumer durable loans, DODs, CCs, ODs, and any other ongoing liabilities.

questions.question: How you'd like to proceed with your loan?
questions.description: Tell us if you’re applying for a fresh loan or want to consolidate your current loans—fully or partially—with or without extra borrowing. If you only want debt consolidation, you can enter zero as the additional funds, later.

questions.question: Have you filed Income Tax Returns (ITRs) for the last 3 financial years?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process your request at this time due to the following reasons: ITR for last 3 years not available.

questions.question: Do you have Current, OD, or CC accounts in any bank with a total active history of 3 years or more?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process your request at this time due to the following reasons: You do not have a current Account, Overdraft (OD), or Cash Credit (CC).

questions.question: Is the GST registration with the current account three years old?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process you request at this time due to the following reasons: GST registration with current account not three year old.

questions.question: Please enter your GST Number?

errorMessage.lengthError: GST Number must be exactly 15 characters long.
errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process your request at this time due to the following reasons: GST registration with current account not three years old.

questions.question: If payslips are available for last 6 months ?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process you request at this time due to the following reasons: Payslips not available.

questions.question: If latest Form-16 is available ?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process you request at this time due to the following reasons: From16 not available.

questions.question: If applicant or any of the co-applicants is NRI?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are unable to process your request at this time due to the following reasons: Applicant is an NRI.

questions.question: Select location for your actual business
city name

errorMessage.message: Kindly select a different city or update your earlier answer.

questions.question: Which of these banks have you used for a Current Account, Overdraft (OD), or Cash Credit (CC)?
questions.description: Select the banks which you use to receive the payments from your customers. Bank statements of these will verify your business income and cash flow.

questions.question: Tell us who's applying
Please specify the type of Business.
questions.description: Lenders evaluate loan applications differently based on the business type selected. If you choose Manufacturing, a CA-audited stock report will be required. However, if your manufacturing is done on a job work basis (i.e., no stock is maintained), please select Service industry instead. Kindly choose the option that best describes your business.

questions.question: What's company type?
If the company is continuously in profit for last three financial years?
How many Directors/Partners are there in the company?
questions.description: As the property is being purchased in the name of the company, it will be the primary applicant and all the Directors/Partners will be co-applicants on the loan.

validation.message: Enter a number greater than one.

questions.question: What's the full name of the Applicant?
questions.description: How it appears on PAN, Passport, Aadhaar or Driving license

questions.question: What's the company name?
questions.description: How it appears on company PAN

questions.question: Please select type of residence
questions.description: Having your own home or a family-owned residence strengthens your loan application, making it more attractive to lenders

questions.question: And what about office premises?
What is the current age? (Select completed years only)
How many years has your company been in business?
What were the Net Profits for the last three financial years?
What's the sum of 'Depreciation' and 'Interest on Loans' as per profit-loss statement?
questions.description: This sum will be included in your eligibility calculation, as these expenses are regarded as non-cash

questions.question: What's the Credit Score?
questions.description: The credit score is a crucial factor that lenders consider to determine your creditworthiness A higher credit score is essential for securing more favorable loan terms and interest rates, directly influencing loan eligibility and approval.

questions.question: Have you ever been defaulter

uiMeta.placeholder: Select the reason why you have low credit score

questions.question: What are the possible reasons behind your low CIBIL score?
questions.description: select all the applicable reasons to help us understand what may be impacting your credit score

options.label: Frequent use of full credit limit
options.value: Frequent use of full credit limit

options.label: Minimum due payments only on credit card
options.value: Minimum due payments only on credit card

questions.question: What type of existing loan do you have?
questions.description: Select the type of loan you currently have. This helps us understand your existing financial commitments better.

questions.question: Which bank is your existing loan with?
questions.description: Choose the bank where you have your current loan. This information helps us coordinate the loan takeover process if needed.

uiMeta.placeholder: How do you plan to close this loan?

questions.question: How would you like to handle this existing loan?
questions.description: Let us know if you'll close this loan yourself or if you'd like us to help with the closure process as part of your new loan.

options.label: will be closed by this loan
options.value: will be closed by this loan

errorMessage.message: Please select a different reason for the closure plan. You have currently chosen “New Loan” as the reason. However, if your intention is to close this existing loan by consolidating it with a new debt consolidation loan, you need to go back and select the debt consolidation option instead. This is necessary because only the debt consolidation option allows you to close existing loans through this process.

==: will be closed by this loan

questions.description: EMI (monthly)

total limit
sanctioned limit (at the time of start)
remaining limit (current)

remaining tenure

interest rate (p.a.)
How long would you like your loan term to be?
questions.description: Choose your preferred loan duration. A longer term means lower monthly payments but more interest over time. You can adjust this later based on your eligibility.

questions.question: Do you have a specific loan amount in mind?
questions.description: Let us know if you have a particular loan amount requirement. This helps us tailor our offerings to your needs.

questions.question: Enter your desired loan amount
questions.description: You can request a loan amount up to ₹1,39,15,400. Enter a value that aligns with your requirements and repayment capacity.
